short_summary: Purchase of laboratory equipment, parts and accessories, services, and supplies reserved to PRE-QUALIFIED SUPPLIERS
tags: Pressure Temperature and Humidity Measuring and Controlling Instruments
full_summary:
## Announcement

**Tender Reference #** PW-22-01019315

**Biosafety Cabinet Tender**
==================================

**Tender Notice**
---------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

**Note**
-----

This tender is reserved for holders of **Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI** and is for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies.

**Key Dates**
------------

* **Publication Date:** December 30, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To be determined

**Tender Details**
----------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
	+ Address: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Eryn Mathers
	+ eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca
	+ 613-298-2804

**Requirements**
-------------

This tender is seeking a supplier capable of providing high-quality biosafety cabinets to support laboratory and scientific operations.

**Pre-qualification Criteria**
---------------------------

Only suppliers pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid. Additional information on the pre-qualification process can be found in the attached tender document.

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender document can be accessed via the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/30/04dcb328d4ffa8e09ee79bc6cef13f33/npp_1000247647.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/30/04dcb328d4ffa8e09ee79bc6cef13f33/npp_1000247647.pdf)

## Important Notes
* ***Only*** suppliers pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.
* The deadline for submission is January 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
* Tenders will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the tender document.
